Building an amplicon sequence variant (ASV) table from 16S data using DADA2

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Building an amplicon sequence variant (ASV) table from 16S data using DADA2](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/microbiome/tutorials/dada-16S/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)

## Features

* Includes [Galaxy Workflow Tests](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/faqs/gtn/workflow_run_test.html)
